context_of_use: This use case allows healthcare staff to access a patient’s medical history to support clinical decision-making and care.
description: Allow healthcare staff to access a patient’s medical history to support clinical decision-making and care.
triggering_event: Healthcare staff requests to view a patient's medical history.
preconditions: Healthcare staff is logged into the system.
Patient's medical history is available in the system.
postconditions: Healthcare staff successfully views the patient's medical history.
assumptions: The system has a feature to manage access control.
The system has a feature to manage clinical data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow healthcare staff to view a patient's medical history.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on data privacy measures during access.
main_flow: 1. doctor → System retrieves the patient's medical history.
2. System displays the patient's medical history to the doctor.
3. nurse → System retrieves the patient's medical history.
4. System displays the patient's medical history to the nurse.
